column1: Table 3-36:  CH4 Emissions from Petroleum Systems (MMT CO2 Eq.)

column2: a Values presented in this table for pneumatic controllers are net emissions. The revised methodology for the 2016 (current) Inventory incorporates GHGRP subpart W activity and emissions data, and is detailed in the Recalculations Discussion section.
Notes: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding. Parentheses indicate emissions reductions.
